casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Darrick KING. No. 581P04-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 21, 2008. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of October 2008 by Defendant to Proceed as Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of October 2008."
